alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 5:05PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Graham and east central Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 505 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness, or 10 miles northeast of Mammoth, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness and San Carlos Reservoir. This includes Route 77 between mile markers 118 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
